text: I unwind the day from my shoulders.
author: AFW

text: Rest is productive in a language busyness cannot read.
author: AFW

text: Hydration is devotion in a glass.
author: AFW

text: I ask my breath what it needs and listen.
author: AFW

text: Small stretches make large rooms in me.
author: AFW

text: I harvest calm from slow movements.
author: AFW

text: Repair begins where I stop bracing.
author: AFW

text: My nervous system learns safety from repetition.
author: AFW

text: I let softness interrupt the spiral.
author: AFW

text: The body keeps the score and also the forgiveness.
author: AFW

text: I practice microâ€‘permission: one sip, one step, one pause.
author: AFW

text: Healing is honest pacing.
author: AFW

text: I let tears complete their task.
author: AFW

text: I anchor the moment by naming five gentle things.
author: AFW

text: I return to alignment one breath at a time.
author: AFW

text: I forgive my body for sounding the alarm too long.
author: AFW

text: Warmth lowers the drawbridge.
author: AFW

text: I thank my cells for showing up anyway.
author: AFW

text: I honor limits as sacred thresholds.
author: AFW

text: I unclench into being carried.
author: AFW
